page.title: 14LIVING IN FELLING,GATESHEAD
page.content:
Felling is situated on a slope down to the River Tyne. Near the bottom, beside the Metro station there are many small mining houses crowded together. The shops in Felling are practically the same.e.g.there are 7 banks and building societies altogether. Laws and the Co-op are the biggest food stores and Woolworths sells everything from records and kettles to D.I.Y. and clothes.
To be in Felling, its really a treat There's lots of people to know and meet To be in Felling, its really neat You give 10 out of 10 as you walk down the street To live in Feling is sometimes dull But at least its not London where its always full.
